cachingLayer

Class DbFeeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cachingLayer.DbFeeder

  • public class DbFeeder
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates cache of normalized server config files and data. Must have 'mongod' running simultaneously.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    ActianceEngInterns
